answers.answer: That's a great idea. We do get a lot of requests for these and will probably continue to do so even after we put up a sticky note, but it doesn't hurt to try. Thanks for the suggestion!

question: Could you possibly make a permanent sticky to explain to people that more trackers are coming, particularly pain, exercise, diabetes?There seems to be a constant request for these items.  Maybe (though I'm not hopeful) people might see the sticky and read it, and will know that these much requested trackers are coming.
title: Sticky
